description: portrait bust of man facing right looking out; white collar; jacket; curly hair; in an elaborate oval frame with paintings on either side; a copy of a book illustration from Descamps' "La vie des peintres flamands allemands et hollandois" Vol 2 page 236

title: Portrait of Gerbrant Vanden Eeckhout
